KitKat::
She looked at the femme bot and growled under her breath. "So you 
want to get back at the bots that put you away huh? Well, if your 
looking for someone to do your dirty work. Forget it. If you want to 
join us and win the war, that may be different story. But let's se if 
you survive first."

Battera::
She acted a little smug towards KitKat. "Look I don't need any pile 
of bolts to do my work for me. I just can't take on an entire 
regiment of maximals alone. It's not only stupid, it's suicide. 
However, we have seemed to get off on the wrong foot. Let's start 
over shall we. My name is Battera. I am seeking help and and would be 
very greatful for any assistance I may be able to get."

She frowned after she said the words. Her original programs were 
trying to surface and now was not the time.

KitKat::
She gave the new comer a funny look and shook her head. "What ever. 
Names KitKat. Now, if you want back at the maximals, you'll have to 
prove yourself first."  Kitkat drew her plasma pistol and grinned 
evilly. "You want to prove it to me? Or the boss?"

Battera::
She tried to look unimpressed, but couldn't help but swallow a little 
hard at the sight of the pistol. "Please my dear. For one thing, it 
would be pointless to try to prove anything to you since you are not 
the leader. Second, what good will you be to the others if 
your...DEAD!"  She transformed into bot mode and stood there, her 
claws ready to dig into metal flesh.





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> She got the orders and the coordinated from Perceptor and went to 
the 
> coordinants.
> 
> Battera::
> 
> She recieved the location and slowly flew down. She didn't trust 
> these bots. But she would have to put on her game face to make it 
out 
> of this alive. She flew down and landed. She saw a wolf at the same 
> location. She flew down and transformed into bot mode. Her wings 
> folded behind her. 
> "Great, I'm looking for a mighty warrior and this is what I find?"
> 
> KitKat::
> She growled. "I am a warrior. And I'll slag any bot that says other 
> wise. What's your name and why are you here? State your business 
> quickly."
> 
> Battera::
> "Fine, you don't have to get pushy. Names Battera. Just flew out of 
a 
> cave cell and wanted to get back at the filthy maximals that put me 
> in there. I can't get revenge alone. I need help."
> 
>
